name: Drive Me Crazy
description:
Download, extract and then run the 'workingOn.exe' file. (The exe is not named properly yet. Sorry!)

Made a part of the 2022 Github Game off. Your feedback is appreciated. 

CONTROLS

Arrow keys - Accelerate in the direction you are facing and use the adjacent arrow keys to switch lanes

Z- Turn on left blinker. Have left blinker on before entering the intersection to turn.

X- Turn on right blinker. Have the right blinker on before entering the intersection to turn.

J - Hide Phone/Map

K - Show Phone/Map

The controls may be a but weird. We feel the same way too! Feel free to leave feedback.

Welcome to Nebula City! As you enter this town and uncover its mysteries, find a way to financially survive my making deliveries provided to you by Grub and Go Inc. (The town and its mysteries part are still in progress)

Plans for this game:

  • RPG elements but the core gameplay will be driving/exploration
  • Story
  • World building

Credits:

Classy - Programming

Majimo - Programming

AirportCrush - Art

Antonio Montes - Music
